name: find-replace
description: Find and replace items of an array
readme: [![view on npm](http://img.shields.io/npm/v/find-replace.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/find-replace) [![npm module downloads](http://img.shields.io/npm/dt/find-replace.svg)](https://www.npmjs.org/package/find-replace) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/find-replace.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/75lb/find-replace) [![Dependency Status](https://david-dm.org/75lb/find-replace.svg)](https://david-dm.org/75lb/find-replace) ## find-replace Find and replace items in an array. **Example** ```js > findReplace = require('find-replace') > findReplace([ 1, 2, 3], 2, 'two') [ 1, 'two', 3 ] > findReplace([ 1, 2, 3], 2, [ 'two', 'zwei' ]) [ 1, [ 'two', 'zwei' ], 3 ] > findReplace([ 1, 2, 3], 2, 'two', 'zwei') [ 1, 'two', 'zwei', 3 ] ``` ### findReplace(array, valueTest, [...replaceWith]) ⇒ array ⏏ **Kind**: Exported function | Param | Type | Description | | --- | --- | --- | | array | array | the input array | | valueTest | valueTest | a query to match the value you're looking for | | [...replaceWith] | any | optional replacement items | * * * © 2015 Lloyd Brookes \<75pound@gmail.com\>. Documented by [jsdoc-to-markdown](https://github.com/jsdoc2md/jsdoc-to-markdown).
